history.content:
The system is only open today to continuing students to choose to keep or change their faculty adviser. If you did not participate in faculty advising last semester or your faculty adviser from last semester is not continuing this semester, you need to wait until the system opens to everyone on Wednesday

EDIT: Some Faculty (including Denero and Fearing) were allocated more students last year than this year because they have other dept responsibilities. Because they cannot accommodate all of last year's students, the system reset all those students. I haven't figured out the fairest way to solve this issue yet.

The system is only open today to continuing students to choose to keep or change their faculty adviser. If you did not participate in faculty advising last semester or your faculty adviser from last semester is not continuing this semester, you need to wait until the system opens to everyone on Wednesday

children.subject: ugh then I don't know. Will reach out to our tech team, sorry! Let me know if you'd like me to reassign you to Prof. Fearing.

OK, We figured it out. Last year Professor Fearing saw 40 students, this year he was only allocated 30, as he has other dept responsibilities. Because he couldn't accommodate all of last year's students, they were all reset. I haven't figured out the fairest way to solve this issue yet.
Hi Nicole. I'm a senior and my faculty advisor for the last several semesters (Fearing) is still on the list, yet I also get the message "Advisers cannot yet be selected."

history.content: Is there anything else I need to do? I am a eecs sophomore. It is past 10 and I got the message: Advisers cannot yet be selected. Did I miss a step in the process?
history.subject: Unable to access advising Portal: Advisers cannot yet be selected at 10:20 AM
